gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 127, Pistons 105
gameRecap.excerpt: Chicago defeats Detroit, 127-105. For Chicago, DeMar DeRozan led the way with 39 points (four 3PM), seven assists, and three steals while aided by Nikola Vucevic (27 points, 11 rebounds, two steals) in the victory. Jalen Duren finished with 20 points and 11 rebounds for Detroit in the losing effort. Chicago improves to 38-42, while Detroit moves to 13-67 with the loss.
